title: SHOW 117 - Bim Afolami (Election Special #5)
itunes:title: SHOW 117 - Bim Afolami (Election Special #5)
itunes:subtitle: Bim Afolami is a rising Conservative star and hasâ€¦
description:
Bim Afolami is a rising Conservative star and has only been an MP since 2017. As a One Nation Conservative who's passionate about climate change, is he happy with the direction and leadership of his party? Can the Conservatives bring the whole UK together in the wake of Brexit? What effect are the politics of London having on the rest of the country? Bim also reveals what his style of football does or doesn't say about his politics. Follow Bim on Twitter: @BimAfolami Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Email your funny campaign stories to politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com Sign up to Matt's mailing list for advance news on Political Party guest announcements plus other almost cool stuff: www.mattforde.com/mailing-list

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
